attributes.action: Make our education system similar to Finland's
attributes.background: Finland's education system is one of the best in the world. There, schools are easier for students (eg not giving them homework, so they can enjoy their youths), but manage to give students good a good education. If we do this, we can progress our research faster and maybe become a superpower again.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, which specific elements of the education system you would like to change.
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
